email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a requirement for shipping 150,000 MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao. The cargo is ready for loading by mid-November. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability?

Best regards,
James Lee
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, with a laycan of Nov 15-20. The starting freight quote is USD 25/MT on CFR basis.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Market rates are hovering around USD 22/MT. Can you revise the quote?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

I understand your concern. Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 23/MT. Additionally, the demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan of Nov 15-20 and send over the contract details.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan of Nov 15-20 is confirmed. I will send the contract details shortly.

Best regards,
Sophia
